description:
What Makes Online Content Go Viral?

This is a tough question. When you look around, you'll see, there's some people who are able to craft contagious content every single time. Do they know something you don't? The answer is Yes! They do!

Let's explore their secrets of Viral and/or Word of Mouth Marketing together.

In this course you can discover what leads people to share content online and off and learn what separates the best brands and stories from the rest.

So, if you want your video, press release, news story, blog post or tweet to reach as many people as possible, there are specific things you can do to increase its chances of being widely shared.

Going viral can mean the difference between success and failure; riches and poverty; immortality and obscurity. But what goes viral and why? Let's explore this together.

Join us today! We wish you a Happy Learning!
title: Viral Marketing: Creating Contagious Social Campaigns
